Generation IX.Scarlet: It feeds others toxic mochi that draw out desires and capabilities. Those who eat the mochi fall under Pecharunt’s control, chained to its will.
Generation IX.Violet: Its peach-shaped shell serves as storage for a potent poison. It makes poisonous mochi and serves them to people and Pokémon.

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Loyalty Plaza (requires Mythical Pecha Berry ) ( Only one )
